description:
After jealous harassment forces an aspiring young man out of a sumo wrestling school, Kaoru steps in to take over his training.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Büyük Şampiyona Mücadelesi / Toramaru`nun Sumo Savaşı!
Mezase Yokozuna! Toramaru no Dosukoi Funsenki
พลังอันยิ่งใหญ่ของโทระมารู
めざせ横綱! 虎丸のどすこい奮戦記
